Description: Fragment of ring of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos; white slip; interior: simple guilloche pattern with eyes and dots above; top: stopt maeander band.
Curator's comments: Lemos incorrectly identifies the sherd as part of the rim of a dinos. For parallels, see British Museum 1888,0601.478.h.+.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 246, no. 291)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2182) (phase 2)
